game.name: Dark Light: Survivor
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In a dying multiverse, the Phantom Train is your last hope. Traverse a post-apocalyptic, cyberpunk world of nightmarish creatures. Experience dynamic shifts between top-down and third-person views, deep customization, and epic battles across universes in this action roguelike survival game.
